content.question: Which of the following statements is true based on the full set of data in the table?

choices.label: The mode fear rating for the counterconditioning group scores is 3.
The median fear rating for the control group scores is 10.
The mean fear rating for the counterconditioning group scores is 3.
The range of the fear ratings for the control group scores is 9.

content.answer: The mean fear rating for the counterconditioning group scores is 3.

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
